content.data:
[Y]Make a Game
[W]Small scope, full finish.
[c][m.]
[W]Start with one mechanic, one screen
[W]and one clear goal.
[W]Prototype controls first, then layer
[W]visuals and sound.
[c][m.]
[G]- Build tiny.
[G]- Test daily.
[G]- Ship version one.
[m][m-]
[Y]PROJECT
[C]Finished and simple beats endless and
[C]broken.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
